HomePage.title: Job Searcher for LinkedIn®
HomePage.about: LinkedIn® has a little-known feature: search using logical operators. Many recommended jobs on the platform are sponsored and highly competitive. Use this tool to refine your searches and find the opportunities that truly match you.

mandatory.title: Mandatory
mandatory.description: Only results that necessarily contain all of these terms will appear. Leave empty to not use.

include.title: Optional
include.description: Results must contain at least one of these terms. Leave empty to not use.

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description: Only results that do not contain any of these terms will appear. Leave empty to not use.
